mapper.insert: INSERT INTO money_log(user_seq, money_type, money, total_money, type, adopt_seq) VALUE(#{userSeq}, #{moneyType.typeStr}, #{money}, #{totalMoney}, #{purposeEnum.purposeStr}, #{adoptSeq});
INSERT INTO money_log(user_seq, money_type, money, total_money, type, charge_log_seq) VALUE(#{userSeq}, #{moneyType.typeStr}, #{money}, #{totalMoney}, #{purposeEnum.purposeStr}, #{chargeLogSeq});
mapper.select: SELECT seq AS moneyLogSeq , user_seq AS userSeq , money_type AS moneyType , money , total_money AS totalMoney , type , adopt_seq AS adoptSeq , support_log_seq AS supportLogSeq , charge_log_seq AS chargeLogSeq , created_at AS createdAt FROM money_log WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} ORDER BY seq DESC

SELECT M.seq AS moneyLogSeq , M.user_seq AS userSeq , M.money_type AS moneyType , M.money , M.total_money AS totalMoney , M.type , M.created_at AS createdAt , A.state AS adoptState , AP.seq AS petSeq , AP.thumbnail AS petThumbnail FROM money_log M INNER JOIN adopt A ON A.seq = M.adopt_seq INNER JOIN abandoned_pet AP ON AP.seq = A.pet_seq WHERE M.seq = #{moneyLogSeq} AND M.user_seq = #{userSeq}

SELECT M.seq AS moneyLogSeq , M.user_seq AS userSeq , M.money_type AS moneyType , M.money , M.total_money AS totalMoney , M.type , M.created_at AS createdAt , C.charge_id AS chargeId FROM money_log M INNER JOIN charge_log C ON C.seq = M.charge_log_seq WHERE M.seq = #{moneyLogSeq} AND M.user_seq = #{userSeq}

SELECT M.seq AS moneyLogSeq , M.user_seq AS userSeq , M.money_type AS moneyType , M.money , M.total_money AS totalMoney , M.type , M.created_at AS createdAt , SP.disease , AP.thumbnail FROM money_log M INNER JOIN support_log SL ON SL.seq = M.support_log_seq INNER JOIN support_pet SP ON SP.seq = SL.support_seq INNER JOIN abandoned_pet AP ON AP.seq = SP.pet_seq WHERE M.seq = #{moneyLogSeq} AND M.user_seq = #{userSeq}
